# Hoyrall Magic Items
## Overview
The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Hoyrall|hoyrall]] magic items introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---

- [[Alien Antennae]]
- [[Bandolier of Endless Daggers]]
- [[Phantom Limb]]
